Package engine.component

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DrawableComponent
    Specifies a component that can be drawn
    MovementNotifier
    Specifies a component that is notified once the position, scale or rotation of an entity is updated.
    UpdateableComponent
    Specifies a component that can be updated
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollisionComponent
    Specifies a component that collides
    ColorComponent
    Specifies a component that has a colour associated with it.
    ColorOscillationComponent
    Specifies a component that allows for a colour to oscillate from one colour to the next
    ComplexMovementComponent
    Specifies movement that includes acceleration
    Component
    Specifies the base type of component.
    ConvexPolygonComponent
    Specifies a convex poly graphical component
    CyclingModifierComponent
    Specifies a component that cycles through a collection of components.
    DisplayComponent
    Specifies a graphical component
    HealthBarComponent
    A health bar that appears above the entity, indicating the amount of health it has.
    KeyboardMoveComponent
    Specifies a game-focused type of keyboard listener.
    ModifierComponent
    Specifies a component that can modify other components over time
    MouseMoveControlComponent
    Specifies a component that will listen to mouse input.
    MovementComponent
    Specifies a component that will involve movement
    MovementOscComponent
    A component that will provide oscillatory motion in a direction based off an oscillator object.
    NotifierComponent
    Specifies a component that gets notified when a condition is met
    OnCollisionComponent
    Specifies a component that does an action on a collision.
    OnDeathComponent
    Specifies a component that does an action upon entity death
    ParticleTrailComponent
    Specifies a component that will allow an entity to have a particle trail behind it based off certain parameters.
    RectangleComponent
    A component that will draw a rectangle on screen.
    SelfDestructComponent
    A component that will set the entity to be removed after a certain time
    ShapeComponent
    A component that will display a shape
    SimpleMovementComponent
    Describes simple movement that include a velocity and angular velocity
    SpriteComponent  
    TextComponent
    A graphical component that contains text
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CollisionID
    An ID that allows collision components to only collide with certain other ID's
    DisplayType
    The type of display of a shape
